posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Ed Abbaticchio Brown Sleeves PSA 4
posts.post_content:
SOLD: T206 Ed Abbaticchio Brown Sleeves PSA 4

This one has a Piedmont back.  I upgraded to a Sovereign back at the National, so I'm selling this one.

Price: $80
Shipping: Free
Paypal: Free
